name: Demon's Den
description:
This game was made for a school project about text and dialog. Play as a man whose basement just recently became haunted by a bipolar demon, and interact with him to uncover his secrets, and maybe get him out of your home!

Hope you'll like it!

Links:

ESA Saint-Luc (my school) : http://www.stluc-bruxelles-esa.be/

All sounds used come from https://freesound.org

The dialog was made with https://www.secretlab.com.au/yarnspinner
